info.title: Project Desert API
info.description: API for managing ascetical practices and spiritual growth

get.description: Get all asceticisms for a specific user that overlap with the date range.

post.description: Subscribe a user to an asceticism.
Log progress for a specific day.

get.description: Get progress statistics for all user asceticisms within a date range.

post.description: Create a debug user for testing purposes.

get.description:
Get all users with their details and activity counts.
Requires admin authentication.

schema.title: Response Get All Users Admin Users Get

post.description:
Update a user's role.
Prevents admins from demoting themselves.

Ban or unban a user.
Prevents admins from banning themselves.

get.description: Get current user info including role and ban status.

post.description: Create a new asceticism package (admin only).

get.description: Get all packages including unpublished ones (admin only).

schema.title: Response Get All Packages Admin Packages Admin All Get

get.description: Get details of a specific published package.

post.description: Publish or unpublish a package (admin only).

get.description: Get all published packages (available to all users).

schema.title: Response Browse Published Packages Packages Browse Get

post.description: Add all asceticisms from a package to the user's account.

get.description:
Get Mass readings for a specific date. Checks database cache first,
then fetches from Universalis API if not cached.
Date should be in YYYYMMDD format (e.g., 20260105).

post.description: Create or update a daily reading note for a user on a specific date.

get.description:
Get a user's daily reading note for a specific date.
Returns 404 if no note exists for that date.
Get all daily reading notes for a user, ordered by date descending.

schema.title: Response Get All User Notes Daily Readings Notes  User Id  Get

delete.description: Delete a daily reading note by ID.

AsceticismStatus.title: AsceticismStatus
AsceticismStatus.description: Status of a user's asceticism commitment.

DailyReadingNoteCreate.title: DailyReadingNoteCreate
DailyReadingNoteCreate.description: Request to create or update a daily reading note.

ToggleBanRequest.title: ToggleBanRequest
ToggleBanRequest.description: Request to ban or unban a user.

UserAsceticismLink.title: UserAsceticismLink
UserAsceticismLink.description: Request to link user to asceticism.
